text: Adriano Faria Pimenta (born 14 November 1982 in Goiânia) is a Brazilian former footballer. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 2001 Nagoya Grampus Eight J1 League 1 0 0 0 1 0 2 0 2007 Yokohama FC J1 League 3 0 0 0 4 2 7 2 Total Total Total 4 0 0 0 5 2 9 2 ==Honours== * Campeonato Pernambucano in 2010 with Sport Recife ==References== Category:Footballers from Goiás Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Goiânia
